titles.title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to allow multijurisdictional gang task forces the opportunity to continue to receive grant funds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

term.name: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

bill.summary: 10/12/1993--Introduced. Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to permit the use of drug control and system improvement grants for multijurisdictional gang task forces.
